text: Röthenbach im Emmental is a municipality in the administrative district Emmental in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:Roethenbach iE Sunset.jpg|Röthenbach im Emmental File:Picswiss BE-94-13 Chuderhüsi ob Würzbrunnen (Röthenbach).jpg|View from the Chuderhüsi observation tower above Würzbrunnen File:Roethenbach Wuerzbrunnen Kirche.jpg|Church of Würzbrunnen File:Roethenbach Kirche.jpg|Church of Röthenbach im Emmental ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Municipalities in Emmental
title: Röthenbach im Emmental
